Package suncertify.db

Interface Summary
DataInterface This interface provides the basic services to be implemented by the connections access the datafile at the non-network or network mode
 

Class Summary
CriteriaFinder This class takes care of executing queries in the database according to a criteria search supplied.
Data This class provides the basic database services.
Database This class implements the basic services for local database.
DataInfo This class embodies the description of a record from the database.
FieldInfo This class embodies the name of a field and the maximum width that it may have.
 

Exception Summary
DatabaseException This class provides a specific class for handle exceptions thrown during the access to records of datafile
